item.title: Post: meanwhile, weather
item.description: hey we got some snow Would you look at that? We got some actual weather. What else? Been keeping myself busy with the JavaScript static site generators. Last week’s card/Astro experiment got slow so I’ve been messing with card/Eleventy. Probably my last note of the year, so: Happy New Year!
item.content:encoded:
hey we got some snow

Would you look at that? We got some actual weather.

What else?

Been keeping myself busy with the JavaScript static site generators. Last week’s card/Astro experiment got slow so I’ve been messing with card/Eleventy.

Probably my last note of the year, so: Happy New Year!
